global.invalidResponseExplanation: The node returned an invalid response.
global.invalidResponsePollingExplanation: The node returned an invalid response while polling.
global.notAvailableExplanation: It will be added at a later stage.
global.unrecognisedPasswordExplanation: Geslo ni bilo prepoznano. Prosimo, poskusite ponovno.

addAdditionalSeed.seedInvalidCharsExplanation: Seeds can only consist of the capital letters A-Z and the number 9. Your seed has invalid characters. Please try again.
addAdditionalSeed.seedTooShortExplanation: Seeds must be at least 60 characters long (ideally 81 characters). Your seed is currently {seed.length} characters long. Please try again.
addAdditionalSeed.nameInUseExplanation: Please use a unique account name for your seed.

changePassword.oopsExplanation: Looks like something went wrong while updating your password. Please try again.
changePassword.passwordUpdatedExplanation: Your password has been successfully updated.
changePassword.incorrectPasswordExplanation: Your current password is incorrect. Please try again.
changePassword.passwordsDoNotMatchExplanation: Passwords do not match. Please try again.
changePassword.passwordTooShortExplanation: Your password must be at least 8 characters. Please try again.
changePassword.oldPasswordExplanation: You cannot use the old password as your new password. Please try again with a new password.
changePassword.ensureStrongPassword: Zagotovite da bo vaše geslo zapleteno in dolgo vsaj 12 znakov.

copyToClipboard.seedClearedExplanation: The seed has been cleared from the clipboard for your security.
copyToClipboard.seedCopiedExplanation: The seed has been copied to the clipboard and will be cleared once you press "DONE" or 60 seconds have passed, whichever comes first.
copyToClipboard.clickToCopy: Click the button below and copy your seed to a password manager.

enterSeed.invalidCharactersExplanation: Seeds can only consist of the capital letters A-Z and the number 9. Your seed has invalid characters. Please try again.
enterSeed.seedTooShortExplanation: Seeds must be at least 60 characters long (ideally 81 characters). Your seed is currently {seed.length} characters long. Please try again.
enterSeed.seedExplanation: Seme mora biti dolgo 81 znakov in mora vsebovati velike črke od A do Z ali številko 9. Uporaba semena daljšega od 81 znakov ni mogoča.
enterSeed.neverShare: Z NIKOMER NIKOLI NE DELITE VAŠEGA SEEDA

login.emptyPasswordExplanation: You must enter a password to log in. Please try again.

loading.loadingFirstTime: Loading seed for the first time.
loading.youMayNotice: You may notice your device slowing down.

newSeedSetup.seedNotGeneratedExplanation: Please click the Generate New Seed button.
newSeedSetup.individualLetters: Pritisnite posamezne znake za jih ponaključit.

onboardingComplete.walletReady: The wallet is now set up and ready to use. If you need to make any changes in the future, look in the Settings menu.

paperWallet.clickToPrint: Kliknite na spodnji gumb za printanje semena v papirnati obliki.
paperWallet.neverShare: Nikoli z nikomer ne delite svojega seeda.

receive.addressCopiedExplanation: Your address has been copied to the clipboard.

saveYourSeed.mustSaveYourSeed: You must save your seed with

seedReentry.incorrectSeedExplanation: The seed you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
seedReentry.thisIsACheck: This is a check to make sure you saved your seed.
seedReentry.ifYouHaveNotSaved: If you have not saved your seed, please go back to the previous screen and do so.

send.invalidAddressExplanation1: Address should be 81 characters long and should have a checksum.
send.notEnoughFundsExplanation: You do not have enough IOTA to complete this transfer.
send.keyReuseExplanation: The address you are trying to send to has already been used. Please try another address.

setPassword.passwordTooShortExplanation: Your password must be at least ${MIN_PASSWORD_LENGTH} characters. It is currently ${this.state.password.length} characters long. Please try again.
setPassword.passwordMismatchExplanation: Vnešeni gesli se ne ujemata. Prosimo, poskusite ponovno.
setPassword.anEncryptedCopy: An encrypted copy of your seed will be stored on your device. You will use this password to access your wallet in future.
setPassword.ensure: Zagotovite da bo vaše geslo zapleteno in dolgo vsaj 12 znakov.

setSeedName.canUseMultipleSeeds: You can use multiple seeds with this wallet. Each seed requires an account name.
setSeedName.youCanAdd: You can add more seeds in the Settings menu.

settings.transferSendingExplanation: Please wait until your transfer has been sent.
settings.generatingAddressExplanation: Please wait until your address has been generated.

resetWalletConfirmation.warning1: All your wallet data including your
resetWalletConfirmation.areYouSure: Are you sure you want to continue?

resetWalletRequirePassword.enterPassword: Enter password to reset your wallet.

walletSetup.okay: Okay. Let's set up your wallet!
walletSetup.doYouAlreadyHaveASeed: Ali že imate seed, ki bi ga želeli uporabiti?
walletSetup.seedExplanation: IOTA seed je kot uporabniško ime in geslo za vaš račun, združeni v enoten niz 81 znakov.
walletSetup.explanation1: You can use it to access your funds from
walletSetup.explanation5: . But if you lose your seed, you also lose your IOTA.
walletSetup.keepSafe: Prosimo vas, da imate seed shranjen na varnem.

welcome.thankYou: Zahvaljujemo se vam za prenos IOTA denarnice.
welcome.weWillSpend: Naslednjih nekaj minut bomo porabili za nastavitve vaše denarnice.
welcome.reminder: Mogoče vas bo zamikalo, da preskočite nekaj korakov, vendar vas pozivamo, da dokončaste proces.

writeSeedDown.yourSeedIs: Your seed is 81 characters read from left to right. Write down your seed and checksum and
